item.title: 澳大利亚通胀飙升促使澳大利亚央行延长暂停期
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的核心通胀率超预期加速上升，使储备银行进一步放松政策的道路变得更加复杂，并促使货币市场削减了对近期降息的押注。【原文：Australia’s core inflation accelerated beyond expectations last quarter, complicating the Reserve Bank’s path to further policy easing and prompting money markets to slash bets on a near-term interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 彭博经济学》称，特朗普几乎没有为东盟提供救济
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与东南亚国家联盟（Association of Southeast Asian Nations）成员国达成的最新贸易协议有可能使这些国家得到的回报少于华盛顿得到的回报。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s latest trade deals with members of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations risks seeing them receive less than Washington gets in return, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 加拿大重建亚洲贸易关系以应对特朗普关税之痛
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大开征的最新一轮关税，正值马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）开始执行使加拿大免受贸易战影响的任务之际。【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff salvo against Canada landed just as Mark Carney was setting out on a mission to insulate his country from the fallout of the trade war.】

item.title: 贝森特呼吁日本给予日本央行抗击通胀的空间
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）呼吁日本新政府给予日本中央银行对抗通货膨胀的空间；这与他在国内向美联储发出的信息形成了鲜明对比。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called on Japan’s new government to give the nation’s central bank the space to combat inflation — marking a stark contrast with his message at home for the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 黄金连跌三日后企稳，贸易希望抑制避险需求
item.description: 中美贸易有望取得突破，市场对风险资产的偏好增强，黄金在连续三日下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after a three-day rout as appetite for riskier assets strengthened on hopes of a US-China trade breakthrough.】

item.title: Cruise 创始人凯尔-沃格特的机器人初创公司希望获得 40 亿美元估值
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，致力于开发能为人类做家务的机器人的初创公司 The Bot Company 将在一轮融资中筹集 2.5 亿美元，该公司的估值将超过 40 亿美元。【原文：The Bot Company, a startup working on robots that can do chores for people, is set to raise $250 million in a funding round that will value the company at more than $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯和库存问题，石油在连续三天下跌后保持稳定
item.description: 由于投资者评估了西方对俄罗斯主要原油生产商的制裁所产生的影响，以及业界对美国库存变化喜忧参半的估计，石油维持了连续三天的跌势。【原文：Oil held a three-day drop as investors assessed the impact of Western sanctions against leading Russian crude producers alongside a mixed industry estimate of US inventory changes.】

item.title: Ares 表示，流动信贷的动荡对私人借贷者有利
item.description: 包括 First Brands Group 和 Tricolor Holdings 在内的近期信贷市场失败案例，引发了对私人债务投资组合风险有多大的热议。但对于战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）的高管们来说，这些损失实际上让私人信贷看起来很不错，同时也为他们提供了一个获得更多交易的机会。【原文：Recent failures in the credit markets, including First Brands Group and Tricolor Holdings, have fueled a frenzy around how much risk is sitting in private debt portfolios. But for Ares Management Corp. executives, the losses actually make private credit look good, while presenting an opportunity to snag more deals.】

item.title: 英伟达老板称美国需要 "精巧 "才能领先中国
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋说，要保持美国在人工智能领域的优势，就必须采取稳健的方法，确保中国继续迷恋美国的技术。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said that maintaining the US edge in artificial intelligence will require a steady approach that ensures China remains hooked on American technology.】

item.title: 印度每小时 2 亿美元的 IPO 热潮显示当地投资者的崛起
item.description: 六个半小时。10 月 7 日，LG 电子印度有限公司首次公开发行的 13 亿美元股票全部售罄，创下了 17 年来印度主要首次公开发行股票中最快的售罄速度。【原文：Six-and-a-half hours. That’s all it took for LG Electronics India Ltd.’s $1.3 billion initial public offering to be fully sold on Oct. 7, marking the fastest take-up in 17 years among major Indian IPOs.】

item.title: 美联储可能会降息，但不会增加任何信号
item.description: 人们对本周美联储会议有两种预期：官员们将把利率下调四分之一个百分点，而主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将不会提供什么指导，因为决策者之间的分歧越来越大，模糊了未来的道路。【原文：Expectations are set for two things from this week’s Federal Reserve meeting: Officials will lower rates by a quarter percentage point and Chair Jerome Powell will offer little guidance as a growing divide among policymakers blurs the path ahead.】

item.title: 研究显示：中国在全球科学领域的领先地位正逐步逼近美国
item.description: 中国有望在科学领域领先世界，至少从一个显性指标来看是如此。【原文：China is on track to lead the world in science — at least by one revealing measure.】

item.title: 人工智能需求信号强劲 SK 海力士出售全部 2026 年芯片产品
item.description: SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：SK Hynix Inc. reported a 62% jump in profit and said customers have already secured its entire memory chip lineup for next year, illustrating how a global AI infrastructure buildout is ratcheting up sector-wide demand.】

item.title: 美联储和人工智能提振情绪，亚洲股市看高一线：市场综述
item.description: 受华尔街对人工智能将继续推动全球最大科技公司盈利增长的乐观预期以及对美联储降息的押注提振，亚洲股市开盘走高。【原文：Asian stocks look set to open higher, buoyed by Wall Street optimism that artificial intelligence will continue to fuel earnings at the world’s largest technology firms and bets on a Federal Reserve rate cut.】

item.title: 了解飓风梅利莎的影响尚需时日
item.description: 自飓风梅利莎作为本季强度最大的风暴袭击牙买加以来，初步报告已经显示洪水泛滥，一片混乱。虽然这些早期的破坏迹象非常强烈，但要评估全部破坏范围可能还需要数小时甚至数天的时间。【原文：Since Hurricane Melissa hit Jamaica as the season’s most-intense storm, initial reports already show flooding and chaos. While those early signs of destruction are powerful, it will likely take hours — if not days — to assess the full scope of the damage.】

item.title: 高盛暂停 25 亿美元塞维塔贷款，计划修改出售方案
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，医疗服务公司 Sevita 正在撤回一笔价值 25 亿美元的杠杆贷款销售，这是投资者加强对借款人审查而撤回的最新一笔数十亿美元的交易。【原文：Healthcare services firm Sevita is withdrawing a $2.5 billion leveraged loan sale, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest multibillion-dollar deal to be pulled as investors ramp up their scrutiny of borrowers.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，爱迪生公司的设备 "很可能 "被认为是洛杉矶火灾的原因
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司首席执行官佩德罗-皮萨罗（Pedro Pizarro）说，如果没有更多证据，该公司的公用事业设备很可能被认定与伊顿大火的起火有关。【原文：Edison International Chief Executive Officer Pedro Pizarro said it is likely that the company’s utility equipment could be found to be associated with the start of the deadly Eaton Fire absent additional evidence.】

item.title: 智利央行将利率维持在 4.75%，防范通货膨胀
item.description: 智利央行在第二次会议上维持关键利率不变，因为决策者们正在等待更明确的迹象，表明新的消费价格风险正在消退，通胀将放缓至目标水平。【原文：Chile’s central bank held its key interest rate unchanged for the second meeting as policymakers await clearer signs that fresh consumer price risks are subsiding and inflation will slow to target.】

item.title: 苹果计划为 MacBook Air、iPad Air 和 iPad Mini 全面升级显示屏
item.description: 苹果公司正准备对其 MacBook Air、iPad mini 和 iPad Air 产品线进行重大调整，计划为这些广受欢迎的设备配备更高端的显示屏。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing major changes to its MacBook Air, iPad mini and iPad Air lines, with a plan to give the popular devices higher-end displays.】

item.title: 可可价格高企影响业绩，奥利奥饼干制造商下调前景预期
item.description: 由于高昂的可可价格继续对奥利奥饼干和丽兹饼干的生产商构成障碍，Mondelez 国际公司下调了全年业绩展望。【原文：Mondelez International Inc. lowered its full-year outlook as high cocoa prices continue to present an obstacle to the maker of Oreo cookies and Ritz crackers.】

item.title: 热门掉期交易面临美联储投资组合计划的关键时刻
item.description: 今年最受欢迎的宏观策略之一--掉期利差交易扩大者，在美联储周三会议上对其 6.6 万亿美元证券投资组合进行更新的广泛预期中面临拐点。【原文：One of this year’s most popular macro strategies, the swap spread trade widener, faces an inflection point in the Federal Reserve’s widely expected update to its $6.6 trillion securities portfolio at Wednesday’s meeting.】

item.title: 邦德之地很安静......也许太安静了？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 消费者持续刷卡消费，Visa 盈利超出预期
item.description: Visa 公司公布的第四财季盈利超过预期，因为消费者继续在全球范围内刷卡、点击和插入信用卡进行交易。【原文：Visa Inc. reported fiscal fourth-quarter earnings that topped estimates as consumers continued to swipe, tap and insert their credit cards to transact globally.】

item.title: 受美国协议影响，Cameco 股票市值一天内增加 90 亿美元
item.description: 卡梅柯公司（Cameco Corp.）周二宣布与美国政府达成协议，将建造至少 800 亿美元的新核反应堆，股价创下历史新高，市值增加了 120 多亿加元（87 亿美元）。【原文：Cameco Corp. gained over C$12 billion ($8.7 billion) in market capitalization on Tuesday as shares rose to a record high after it announced a pact with the US government to build at least $80 billion of new nuclear reactors.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司的鲁布纳认为股市将继续上涨
item.description: Citadel 证券公司的斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）表示，美国股市似乎有望延续创纪录的上涨势头，甚至有可能像往常一样在年底加速上涨。【原文：Citadel Securities’ Scott Rubner said the US stock market appears primed to extend its record-setting run — and maybe even accelerate its usual year-end gains.】

item.title: 美国塔台就价值 2.1 亿美元的合同起诉 Dish
item.description: American Towers LLC 起诉 Dish Wireless，称这家由亿万富翁查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）控制的电信公司正以出售 400 亿美元的无线频谱为借口，放弃支付使用基站塔的费用。【原文：American Towers LLC sued Dish Wireless, claiming the telecom company controlled by billionaire Charlie Ergen is using the sale of $40 billion in wireless spectrum as an excuse to quit paying to use cell towers.】

item.title: 巴斯夫提前实施股票回购计划以提振股价
item.description: 由于化工行业面临贸易壁垒和汽车行业需求低迷，巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）将提前实施部分股票回购计划，以提振股价。【原文：BASF SE is bringing forward parts of its share buyback program to bolster its stock price as the chemicals industry struggles with trade barriers and subdued demand from the car industry.】

item.title: 美国银行调整技术、媒体和电信银行业务领导层
item.description: 继资深交易员凯文-布鲁纳（Kevin Brunner）离职，转投竞争对手摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Bank of America Corp. has announced new leaders of its technology, media and telecommunications investment banking business, following the departure of veteran dealmaker Kevin Brunner to rival JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋努力说服投资者人工智能没有泡沫
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋驳斥了人们对人工智能泡沫的担忧，称公司的最新芯片有望在未来几个季度创造 5 万亿美元的收入。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang dismissed concerns about an artificial intelligence bubble, saying the company’s latest chips are on track to generate half a trillion dollars in revenue during the coming quarters.】

item.title: 国债需求疲软，等待美联储发行七年期国债
item.description: 尽管市场对七年期国债拍卖的需求疲软，但国债收益率仍保持了近几周的大部分升幅，这使得国债收益率达到了今年的最低水平，市场预期美联储将在周三降息。【原文：Treasuries held most of the advance that’s driven yields toward their lowest levels of the year in recent weeks despite weak demand for an auction of seven-year notes, anticipating a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut on Wednesday.】
